segments.text: May I exchange this DVD player ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Do you have your receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , why do you want to exchange it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . I'll get you a new player .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At first , I thought it was me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , here's a new one for you .
segments.speaker: S2
